contentrichtext.text: '''Vernon Carrington''' (November 1, 1936 - March 22, 2005) founded the [[Mansions_of_Rastafari#Twelve_Tribes_of_Israel|Twelve Tribes of Israel]] branch of the [[Rastafari movement]] in 1968. He was also called the Prophet Gad. Members of the Twelve Tribes of Israel view Carrington as a prophet who began the repatriation of Rastafari to Africa, the homeland. He was a member of The Ethiopian World Federation, founded by Emperor [[Haile Selassie]] of Ethiopia. Carrington's branch (chapter #15) became The Twelve Tribes Of Israel. {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Carrington, Vernon | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = November 1, 1936 | PLACE OF BIRTH = Kingston | DATE OF DEATH = March 21, 2005 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Carrington, Vernon}} [[Category:Jamaican Rastafarians]] [[Category:1936 births]] [[Category:2005 deaths]] [[Category:Prophets]] {{Jamaica-bio-stub}} {{reli-bio-stub}}
